item.title: Director's List award
item.description: An award given to students who obtain 3.5 or higher GPA in a semester and are members of MEP/MSP.
item.content:
The Dean's List Award

This award is given to students who maintain a GPA of 3.5 or higher for a specific semester and are members of MESA Engineering Program (MEP) and/or Maximizing Science Potential (MSP).

I received this award in fall 2011.

To see the full size award click here.

item.title: MESA Participation Award
item.description: An award given to students who have an outstanding participate in the MESA programs.
item.content:
MESA Participation Award

I received this award for my outstanding participation in the MESA Engineering Program (MEP) and Maximizing Science Potential (MSP) programs.

This award also includes a $500 stipend.

To see the full size award click here.

item.title: MESA Olympics Award
item.description: An award given to students who participate in the MESA Olympics & Robotics Competition.
item.content:
MESA Olympics & Robotics Competition Participation Award

I received this award for my participation in the 19th MESA Olympics.

The MESA Olympics is a test competition between groups of four. There are three levels of the test all in which cover chemistry, physics and calculus.

To see the full size award click here.

item.title: Dean's List award
item.description: An award given to students who obtain 3.5 or higher GPA in a semester.
item.content:
The Dean's List Award

This award is given to students who maintain a GPA of 3.5 or higher for a specific semester.

I received this award for the fall semester of 2011.

To see the full size letter click here.

item.title: LSAMP Participation Award
item.description: An award given to students who participate in the LSAMP program.
item.content:
LSAMP Participation Award

This award is given to students who participate in the LSAMP summer pathway through calculus.

To see the full size award click here.

item.title: P.U.L.L. Recongnition award
item.description: An award given to students who volunteered in the PULL program.
item.content:
Promoting University Learning and Leadership Award

This award is my first award at San Diego State University. This award was given to me for my participation at the PULL program as a mentor for a high school junior. For more information about the PULL program visit my volunteering section.

To see the full size award click here.

item.title: ECV Braves Recognition
item.description: One of the hardest awards that a student can get at El Cajon Valley High School.
item.content:
Braves Recognition Award

This Award is only given at the end of the semester for one student who has an outstanding performance in a specific subject.

I received this award for my performance at the Virtual Enterprise class in which I was the Vice President of Technology for the company. I did not only fulfill my responsibilities, but also took upon becoming the technician, tech support, website designer, graphics design and many other roles that our team was missing.

To see the full size award click here.

item.title: ROP Business and Computers
item.description: One of the best business training programs in San Diego.
item.content:
ROP Business and Computers

ROP is a training program in which trains students to be successfull in business. Business and Computers class provided the training need to use computers in any form of business.

To see the full size award click here.

To see the full detailed version of this award click here.

item.title: ROP Business and Computers Appreciation
item.description: A certificate given instead of the Braves recongnition award.
item.content:
Certificate of Appreciation

Given for me for my outstanding performance in ROP Business and Computers instead of the Braves Recognition Award because of the school rules about the braves recongnition award. A student can only be nominated once for the braves awrad in the same department.

To see the full size award click here.

item.title: PIQE recongnition award
item.description: A certificate given to student who participated in the PIQE.
item.content:
Parent Institute for Quality Education

An award given for my participation and volunteering at the PIQE weekly meetings. For more information about the PIQE check out the volunteering section.

To see the full size award click here.

item.title: Junior Achievement
item.description: A certificate given to student who completed the JA training program.
item.content:
Junior Achievement

An award given for my participation and completing the JA training program. For more information about the JA program visit their official website.

To see the full size award click here.
